channel.title: Need help!
channel.description:
ok i had a run and a compile together when i had a server. Does anyone know where the link is or can they give me the code because the link i have saying that its missing or something like that.
Its so i can help my mate make a server and hes very slow so i thought this will be the best way for him.

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @RACERDAN RACERDAN
item.description:
@RACERDAN wrote:

i will try them both out its only to help few people on my msn they keep asking me on how to run a server so i thought a compile and run server is a good thing for some1 who is starting

thanks alot for the help

Read full topic

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Racer, heres a compiler+ runserver together and much smaller :

@echo off
title Yourscape Compiler
javac *.java
title Yourscape Server
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause

Read full topic

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @RACERDAN RACERDAN
item.description:
@RACERDAN wrote:

I think it was mod something that who made it. And it was where you edit your compile so you can press enter to compile it or r and enter to run the server.

I just think this will be a better way for a new person to use a server thats why i need it
